: : SharpClaw : :
With Battera now talking to Flicker, SharpClaw sits with KitKat.

SharpClaw: So what did you need to take care of? And if you dont mind me asking, you seem different. Mind telling me what changed?


raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::
She stood next to SharpClaw as she looked at whom she thought the 
leader was. "I am Battera. Loather of Maximals and revenge seeker. I 
am looking to join a group that will aid me on my quest of revenge. I 
hope you are the ones that can help me."


KitKat::
She was in the mess hall when she turned and saw SharpClaw with the 
new femme. She stopped and looked at SharpClaw. Her memory chip 
brought back the image of Drillbit. She stared for a moment, then 
shook her head to clear her mind of the past. She sat down at a table 
and started to drink the liquid energon. What did she see in 
SharpClaw to make her think of Drillbit, she wondered. Perhaps her 
old chips just needed to be replaced. She sighed and drank her 
energon.
